snippet.title: Darksiders III - gamescom 2018 Trailer
snippet.description:
The gates of gamescom are open and angels and demons alike gather to watch the new Darksiders trailer. Will Fury be able to defeat the seven Deadly Sins and ride with her brothers once more?

Darksiders III is set for release on November 27, 2018 for PC, PS4 and Xbox One! Pre-order here for special discounts and early access: https://darksiders.com/order-here/
